summary: This is an email chain between FBI personnel discussing coordination for a new victim interview at the SDNY (Southern District of New York) on July 12, 2019. The emails focus on arranging victim services and maintaining continuity of support.

persons.name: NY FBI
persons.context: The sender of the main email, coordinating to be present at the SDNY trial and potentially meet with a victim to conduct service referrals.

persons.name: NY FBI
persons.context: The sender of the earlier email, informing about a new victim interview and requesting assistance with offering services to the victim and her attorneys.

connections.description: FBI colleagues coordinating victim support services related to the Epstein case.

events.title: New victim interview at SDNY
events.description: A new victim of Jeffrey Epstein is scheduled to be interviewed at the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: A new victim of Jeffrey Epstein was being interviewed at the SDNY on July 12, 2019.
FBI personnel were coordinating to provide victim services and maintain rapport with the victim.
The communication indicates ongoing investigative activity and victim support efforts in July 2019.
